show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: The Wake Up Call
content:
An opportunity to delve into what goes on inside my brain (if anything) when I select material to present to you, my... <!--more--> faithful and loyal listeners.
Otherwise described as a Memorial Day fantasy.
As in the case of a restaurant visit, you have a right to know the ingredients that go into intellectual slop I serve up twice a week but not why I used them.
A couple of thoughts on why America is so obsessed with going to war.
(Warning: no answer is forthcomingâ€¦) A fairly long treatise on Game Theory.
I hope you enjoy it!
Happy Memorial Day.
